text: Ate lokam ne usa tom bina ajihe hora pujanika bana la'e hana. Jihare kise ciza nu paida nahim kara sakade, uha khuda paida kite ga'e hana. Ate uha khuda apane la'i na hani da adhikara rakhade hana ate na labha da. Ate na uha kise mauta da adhikara rakhade hana ate na kise de jivana da ate na mara ke mura jivata hona da
